article.title: Raytheon to Repair Multi-Spectral Targeting System
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Co., McKinney, Texas, is being awarded $9,618,024 for delivery order #7024 under a previously issued basic ordering agreement for the repair of the H-60 multi-spectral targeting system forward looking infrared turrets. Naval Supply Systems Command, Weapon Systems Command, Philadelphia, Pa., is the contracting activity.
